pages.name: Wheat
pages.text: A depiction of a fully grown wheat crop.

pages.title: Seeds
pages.text: Wheat seeds seem to only be found by using a hoe on grass or in villages far away from where my journey began.

pages.title: Crop
pages.text: Once harvested wheat can be processed in many different ways. The following pages are all the products I have been able to produce from wheat.
